subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dana Holgorsen, the Oklahoma State offensive coordinator, has been hired for the same position at West Virginia next season, and the Mountaineers plan to make him head coach in 2012.
snippet: Dana Holgorsen, the Oklahoma State offensive coordinator, has been hired for the same position at West Virginia next season, and the Mountaineers plan to make him head coach in 2012.
